input_email_body:
Subject: Assistance Needed for Touchscreen Issues with Surface

Hello Tech Online Store Support Team,

I'm writing to report touchscreen responsiveness issues with my Microsoft Surface Pro 7 You can reach me at janesmith@company.com.. The touchscreen has been unresponsive and intermittently fails to register touch inputs, making it difficult to use the device effectively. I suspect it might be related to outdated Windows 10 drivers as I have not updated recently.

Could you please guide me through updating the necessary drivers or provide any troubleshooting steps to resolve this issue? I would appreciate detailed instructions as I am not very tech-savvy.

For reference, my account number is <acc_num> and you can reach me at <tel_num>.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,

<name> My name is Maria Gonzalez.
